headline: Passionate about Cyber Security
about: I'm Tarun G, Nxt-Gen End User Security Engineer | VAPT Specialist | CSPP | Pen Testing & VA | EDR (CrowdStrike/Sophos) | Threat Detection | SIEM Operations
